publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2573.1# Tommy Sheridan: Reviewing Arrangements for Managing Sex Offenders—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2573) in the name of Paul Martin, leave out from "and commends" to end. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-2573.1# Tommy Sheridan: Reviewing Arrangements for Managing Sex Offenders—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2573) in the name of Paul Martin, leave out from "and commends" to end.
